author_bio.name: About This Plugin
author_bio.description:
One Forgotten Default displays a single, carefully chosen assumption ‚Äî followed by the reason it might not be true. Designed for reflection rather than productivity, this plugin offers a quiet mental reset during your day. Each message is short, intentional, and meant to be read slowly.

Perfect for:
* moments of pause
* desks, kitchens, or shared spaces
* anyone who enjoys calm, thoughtful prompts instead of notifications

Updated daily. No interaction required.

One Forgotten Default was created by Herre, sometimes the boss at Verotopia.

author_bio.name: About This Plugin
author_bio.description:
Conway's Game of Life is a cellular automaton devised by the British mathematician John Horton Conway in 1970. Watch as the cellular field evolves throughout the day based on rules applied to each cell and its neighbors.

To understand the available options visit the live simulator.

The same cellular field is seen across all devices and resets daily at 8AM GMT.

custom_fields.name: Render Style
custom_fields.description: This configures how large the individual cells are (higher numbers reduce the visible grid size)

author_bio.name: About This Plugin
author_bio.description:
Element of the Day brings the wonder of chemistry to your TRMNL device by displaying a different element from the Periodic Table each day (or hour).

Features:
üî¨ 118 elements with comprehensive scientific data
‚è∞ Daily rotation or hourly random display modes
üìä Atomic number, mass, electron configuration, and more
üé® Periodic table-style card design
üì± Four optimized layouts (Full, Half Horizontal, Half Vertical, Quadrant)
‚ö° Fast static data delivery via GitHub Pages
üß™ Data sourced from PubChem database

Setup:
1. Install or Fork this recipe
2. Choose your preferred display mode (Daily or Hourly)
3. Select your favorite layout size
4. Add to your playlist and learn chemistry one element at a time

Perfect for students, educators, science enthusiasts, or anyone curious about the building blocks of matter. Each element includes atomic properties, physical characteristics, and historical discovery information.

Data Source: All 118 elements verified from PubChem (National Center for Biotechnology Information)

custom_fields.help_text: Daily Rotation cycles through all 118 elements based on the day of year. Hourly Random shows a different element each hour.

custom_fields.help_text: We will need your Caldav plugin ID, please go to your Caldav plugin page, open the Caldav that you would like to link and see in the URL bar the id that we need. (You see usetrmnl.com/plugin_settings/123, the 123 number is what we need).

custom_fields.help_text: This is only for the full view, and the half-vertical view.

custom_fields.name: About This Plugin
custom_fields.description: Never forget a birthday again! The Birthday Calendar for your TRMNL shows you all upcoming birthdays. Enter once, repeated yearly! Recipe created by Jasper, @jasper on TRMNL Discord. Plugin Icon by sentya irma from Noun Project (CC BY 3.0).

custom_fields.name: Birthdays
custom_fields.description: List birthdates of your family and friends. Enter `Name ; YYYY-MM-DD` or `Name ; MM-DD`
custom_fields.help_text: Enter as follows `Jasper ; 1976-04-11` (`Name ; YYYY-MM-DD`). Don't know the year of birth, just enter `Name ; MM-DD`

custom_fields.name: Only show when birthdays are within the next..
custom_fields.description: The plugin won't show if there are no birthdays upcoming. Makes for a cleaner playlist.

author_bio.name: About This Plugin
author_bio.description:
Max Payne Quotes brings the iconic noir dialogue from the legendary Max Payne trilogy directly to your TRMNL device.

Features:
üéÆ 39 authentic quotes from Max Payne, Max Payne 2, and Max Payne 3
üó®Ô∏è Noir-style typography with Courier New monospace font
üì± Optimized layouts for all TRMNL view sizes
üé® Game-specific poster artwork for visual atmosphere
üé≤ Random quote selection with daily automatic updates

Setup:
1. Install or Fork this recipe
2. The plugin automatically polls for a new quote every 24 hours
3. Add to your playlist and enjoy noir wisdom on your e-ink display

All quotes are verified authentic from Wikiquote and capture the philosophical, dark, and action-packed moments that made Max Payne an iconic character in gaming.

Quote Database: 39 quotes verified from Wikiquote (35 Max Payne across trilogy, 4 Mona Sax)

author_bio.name: About This Plugin
author_bio.description:
Displays upcoming live departures for a chosen bus stop in the UK.

About

Departure and stop data is provided via bustimes.org. Bus stop information such as the stop name is fetched from the bustimes.org API. Departure data is sadly not available via this API so it has to be scraped from the HTML.

Setup

To display departure data for a stop you will need the stop's ATCO code.
You can find it by navigating to your stop on https://bustimes.org/map and opening the departure page. The ATCO code starts with at least four digits (not letters) and is displayed directly above the departure table.

Alternatively, you can download the ATCO codes for your local authority from this DfT website.

You can specify a list of bus services to display. Just use the usual name of the service, e.g. '10' or '3A'. If left empty, the plugin will simply display all services with departures from the stop.

Attributions

All data is provided by bustimes.org thanks to its maintainers and contributors who keep the project running.

custom_fields.name: Busses

custom_fields.help_text: Use the name of the service, e.g. '10' or '3A'.

author_bio.name: About This Plugin
author_bio.description: Arrival times for MBTA stops

custom_fields.name: About This Plugin
custom_fields.description: Arrival times for MBTA stops

custom_fields.name: Stop ID
custom_fields.description: Enter the MBTA Stop ID. To find the Stop ID for subway, commuter rail, and ferry stops, navigate to the MBTA Subway Stops website and click on the stop. The Stop ID will be the last part of the URL (For example, the URL for Back Bay Station is https://www.mbta.com/stops/place-bbsta so the Stop ID is "place-bbsta"). To find the Stop ID for buses, navigate to the MBTA Bus Stops website and click on the desired route. Make sure the correct direction is selected, then click on the stop. The Stop ID will be the last part of the URL (For example, the URL for Jackson Square is https://www.mbta.com/stops/place-jaksn so the Stop ID is "place-jaksn").

custom_fields.name: (Optional) Filter Subway Routes
custom_fields.description: By default, all subway, Green Line, and Mattapan Trolley routes are included. Use this filter to only include selected routes.
custom_fields.help_text: Use <kbd>‚åò</kbd>+<kbd>click</kbd> or <kbd>ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>click</kbd> to select and deselect multiple options.

custom_fields.name: (Optional) Filter Commuter Rail Routes
custom_fields.description: By default, all commuter rail routes are included. Use this filter to only include selected commuter rail routes.
custom_fields.help_text: Use <kbd>‚åò</kbd>+<kbd>click</kbd> or <kbd>ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>click</kbd> to select and deselect multiple options.

custom_fields.name: (Optional) Filter Silver Line and Crosstown Buses
custom_fields.description: By default, all Silver Line and Crosstown bus routes are included. Use this field to only include selected bus routes.
custom_fields.help_text: Use <kbd>‚åò</kbd>+<kbd>click</kbd> or <kbd>ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>click</kbd> to select and deselect multiple options.

custom_fields.name: (Optional) Filter Bus Routes
custom_fields.description: By default, all bus routes are included. Use this field to only include selected bus routes. Use the bus number (Ex. 39).

custom_fields.name: (Optional) Filter Ferry Routes
custom_fields.description: By default, all ferry routes are included. Use this filter to only include selected ferry routes.
custom_fields.help_text: Use <kbd>‚åò</kbd>+<kbd>click</kbd> or <kbd>ctrl</kbd>+<kbd>click</kbd> to select and deselect multiple options.

author_bio.name: About This Plugin
author_bio.description:
Displays a YES/NO if Mercury is in Retrograde.
Learn more about Mercury in Retrograde here.

In astrology, Mercury rules over things like communication, how we process information, local travel, planning your schedule, and your routine. Confusion and mishaps can occur when Mercury moves retrograde, but if you understand more about this common event, you can navigate your daily life with less stress.

This is a rif on the website https://ismercuryinretrograde.com/.

Support this project

author_bio.name: About This Plugin
author_bio.description:
Display real-time statistics from your Pi-hole network-wide ad blocker on your TRMNL device. Monitor DNS queries, blocked requests, system performance, query history charts, and top blocked domains.

Requirements: Pi-hole device with SSH access (root or sudo access required), TRMNL webhook URL from plugin settings.

Installation: Run the install script on your Pi-hole via SSH. Updates automatically every 15 minutes. Full instructions available in the GitHub repository.

For issues or suggestions, please raise an issue on GitHub or send an email.
